game.name: UnderDark: Defense
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, In-App Purchases, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 함께 도전하는 로그라이트 타워 디펜스. 타워를 배치하고 랜덤 버프로 빌드를 성장시키며 친구와 온라인 협동으로 언더다크의 위험을 버티세요. 당신들과 동료의 시너지만이 어둠을 막아낼 수 있습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Team up and take on this roguelite tower defense challenge. Strategically place towers to block enemy paths, draft random buffs to evolve your build, and withstand the dangers of the Underdark through online co-op with a friend. Only the synergy between you and your ally can hold back the darkness.
